21 
22 class LedRingCommander(object):
23  """
24  This class is in charge of the Led Ring Node
25  Its main goal is to interpret commands, and use methods from the LedRingCommander class according to this command
26  """
27 
28  def __init__(self):
29  rospy.loginfo("Led Ring Commander - Initialisation")
30  self.__is_shutdown = False
31  self.__is_simulation = rospy.get_param("~simulation_mode")
32 
33  self.led_ring_anim = LedRingAnimations()
34  self.robot_status = RobotStatus.BOOTING
35  self.robot_status_str = ""
36  self.logs_status = RobotStatus.NONE
37  self.robot_out_of_bounds = False
38  self.rpi_overheating = False
39 
40  self.user_animation_lock = threading.Lock()
41  self.led_ring_animation_thread = threading.Thread()
42 
43  self.error_animation_lock = threading.Lock()
44  self.led_ring_state = LedRingStatus()
45 
46  self.user_mode = False # True if controlled by user, False if displaying robot state (priority)
47  self.running_status_command = None
48 
49  self.dict_led_ring_methods = {
50  LedRingAnimation.NONE: self.none_animation,
51  LedRingAnimation.SOLID: self.solid_animation,
52  LedRingAnimation.ALTERNATE: self.alternate_animation,
53  LedRingAnimation.CHASE: self.chase_animation,
54  LedRingAnimation.FLASHING: self.flashing_animation,
55  LedRingAnimation.COLOR_WIPE: self.wipe_animation,
56  LedRingAnimation.RAINBOW: self.rainbow_animation,
57  LedRingAnimation.RAINBOW_CYLE: self.rainbow_cycle_animation,
58  LedRingAnimation.RAINBOW_CHASE: self.rainbow_chase_animation,
59  LedRingAnimation.GO_UP: self.go_up_animation,
60  LedRingAnimation.GO_UP_AND_DOWN: self.go_up_and_down_animation,
61  LedRingAnimation.BREATH: self.breath_animation,
62  LedRingAnimation.SNAKE: self.snake_animation,
63  LedRingAnimation.CUSTOM: self.custom_animation,
64  }
65 
66  # - Publishers
67  self.__led_ring_status_pub = rospy.Publisher('~led_ring_status', LedRingStatus, latch=True, queue_size=10)
68  rospy.sleep(1)
69  self._publish_led_ring_status() # publish the status at the beginning
70 
71  self.display_user_mode() # Turn on the leds with the right animation
72 
73  # Define this object as an observer of led_ring_anim, so when an observable
74  # variable change, this node is informed.
75  # This is usefull for the current animation and the current color, which are
76  # managed by the led ring commander class.
77  self.led_ring_anim.register_observer(self)
78 
79  # - Services
80  self.__set_ring_led_user = rospy.Service('~set_user_animation', LedUser, self.__callback_set_led_ring_user)
81  self.__set_led_color_service = rospy.Service('~set_led_color', SetLedColor, self.__callback_set_led_color)
82  rospy.Service('~get_led_colors', GetLedColors, self.__callback_get_led_colors)
83 
84  # - Subscribers
85  self.robot_status_subscriber = rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_status/robot_status',
86  RobotStatus,
87  self.__callback_robot_status,
88  queue_size=1)
89  rospy.Subscriber("/niryo_robot/blockly/save_current_point", Int32, self.__callback_save_current_point)
90  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_user_interface/niryo_studio_connection',
91  ConnectionState,
92  self.__callback_niryo_studio)
93  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot/hotspot_button_state', HotspotButtonStatus, self.__callback_hotspot_button_state)
94 
95  self.__check_shutdown_timer = rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration(2), self.shutdown_check)
96  rospy.on_shutdown(self.shutdown)
97  rospy.loginfo("Led Ring Commander - Started")
98 
99  def shutdown(self, color=None):
100  if not self.__is_shutdown:
101  self.__is_shutdown = True
102  self.robot_status_subscriber.unregister()
103  self.stop_led_ring_thread()
104  self.user_animation_lock.acquire()
105 
106  command = LedUserRequest()
107  command.colors = [WHITE]
108  command.iterations = 1
109  command.period = 2
110  self.breath_animation(command)
111 
112  self.blink(WHITE, 8, 0.5)
113  self.error_animation_lock.acquire()
114 
115  if color is None:
116  self.none_animation(None)
117  else:
118  self.led_ring_anim.solid(color)
119  time.sleep(0.5)
120  # self.__is_shutdown = True
121  rospy.signal_shutdown("shutdown")
122 
123  def shutdown_check(self, *_):
124  try:
125  if not rospy.is_shutdown() and not self.__is_shutdown:
126  rosnode.get_node_names()
127  except rosnode.ROSNodeIOException:
128  self.shutdown()
129 
130  @property
131  def is_shutdown(self):
132  return self.__is_shutdown
133 
134  # - Callbacks
135  def __callback_robot_status(self, msg):
136  """
137  Callback method to set led ring state according to current robot status.
138  This callback takes precedence over the user's led ring control method, if the
139  robot status is not RUNNING_AUTONOMOUS and logs status is not NONE.
140  It is triggered only when the robot status changed.
141  """
142  if msg.robot_status == RobotStatus.SHUTDOWN:
143  self.shutdown()
144  elif msg.robot_status in [RobotStatus.REBOOT, RobotStatus.UPDATE]:
145  self.shutdown(WHITE)
146  elif self.robot_status == RobotStatus.BOOTING != msg.robot_status:
147  rospy.sleep(3.5) # because no fade
148  if not self.__is_simulation:
149  from niryo_robot_led_ring.led_ring_utils import enable_led_ring
150  enable_led_ring(rospy.get_param('~enable_led_ring_bcm_pin'))
151  self.led_ring_anim.init_led_ring()
152  # self.led_ring_anim.fade(BLUE)
153 
154  new_robot_status = self.robot_status != msg.robot_status
155  new_robot_out_of_bound = self.robot_out_of_bounds != msg.out_of_bounds
156  new_rpi_overheating = self.rpi_overheating != msg.rpi_overheating
157 
158  if new_robot_status or new_robot_out_of_bound or new_rpi_overheating:
159 
160  if new_robot_status and msg.robot_status in [RobotStatus.CALIBRATION_IN_PROGRESS, RobotStatus.REBOOT_MOTOR]:
161  rospy.sleep(0.5) # for synchro
162  self.blink(YELLOW, 3, 1)
163 
164  self.robot_status = msg.robot_status
165  self.robot_status_str = msg.robot_status_str
166  self.logs_status = msg.logs_status
167  self.robot_out_of_bounds = msg.out_of_bounds
168  self.rpi_overheating = msg.rpi_overheating
169 
170  self.set_user_mode(
171  self.robot_status in [RobotStatus.RUNNING_AUTONOMOUS, RobotStatus.LEARNING_MODE_AUTONOMOUS])
172  self.display_user_mode()
173 
174  def __callback_set_led_ring_user(self, req):
175  """
176  Service to allow the user to control the Led Ring. A new request will interrupt the previous one, if still
177  playing.
178  """
179  if not self.user_mode:
180  # if the status of the robot is not RUNNING_AUTONOMOUS
181  return CommandStatus.ABORTED, "Led Ring not in autonomous mode, user can't control it"
182 
183  animation = req.animation_mode.animation
184 
185  rospy.logdebug('Led ring - controled by user, animation n. {}'.format(animation))
186  if animation in self.dict_led_ring_methods:
187  self.start_user_thread(req)
188 
189  animation_name = ROBOT_ANIM_TO_STRING[animation]
190  if req.wait_end and (req.iterations != 0 or animation == LedRingAnimation.COLOR_WIPE):
191  interrupted = self.wait_until_finished()
192  return self._return_after_waiting(animation_name, req.iterations, interrupted)
193  else:
194  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Led Ring set by user: {} mode launched".format(animation_name)
195  else:
196  return CommandStatus.FAILURE, "Led Ring set by user: command request doesn't exist"
197 
198  def __callback_set_led_color(self, req):
199  if not self.user_mode:
200  # if the status of the robot is not RUNNING_AUTONOMOUS
201  return CommandStatus.ABORTED, "Led Ring not in autonomous mode, user can't control it"
202 
203  if not (0 <= req.led_id < self.led_ring_anim.led_count):
204  return CommandStatus.FAILURE, "Wrong led id, must be between 0 and {}".format(
205  self.led_ring_anim.led_count - 1)
206 
207  self.led_ring_anim.set_led_color(req.led_id, req.color)
208 
209  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Successfully set led {} at color {}".format(
210  req.led_id, [req.color.r, req.color.g, req.color.b])
211 
212  def __callback_get_led_colors(self, _):
213  led_ring_colors = map(get_rgba_color_from_list, self.led_ring_anim.get_state_list_from_pixel_strip())
214  return GetLedColorsResponse(status=CommandStatus.SUCCESS,
215  message='Successfully retrieved the leds colors',
216  led_ring_colors=list(led_ring_colors))
217 
218  def __callback_save_current_point(self, _msg):
219  if not self.user_mode:
220  self.blink_over_status(WHITE, 1, 0.5)
221 
222  def __callback_niryo_studio(self, msg):
223  if msg.state in [ConnectionState.connection, ConnectionState.close] and not self.user_mode:
224  self.blink_over_status(PURPLE, 2, 0.5)
225 
226  def __callback_hotspot_button_state(self, msg):
227  if msg.state == HotspotButtonStatus.RELEASED and msg.mode != HotspotButtonStatus.IGNORE_PRESS:
228  self.blink(BLUE, 2, 0)
229  self.display_user_mode()
230  elif msg.mode in [HotspotButtonStatus.LONG_PRESS, HotspotButtonStatus.VERY_LONG_PRESS]:
231  command = LedUserRequest()
232  command.animation_mode.animation = LedRingAnimation.FLASHING
233  command.colors = [PURPLE] if msg.mode == HotspotButtonStatus.VERY_LONG_PRESS else [WHITE]
234  self.start_led_ring_thread(command)
235  else:
236  self.display_user_mode()
237 
238  def notify_current_anim_and_color(self, _observer):
239  """
240  called by the led_ring_anim when the current animation played or the color on the Led Ring is updated,
241  used to publish Led STATUS
242  """
243  self._publish_led_ring_status()
244 
245  # - Threads
246  def start_user_thread(self, command):
247  self.stop_led_ring_thread()
248  self.led_ring_animation_thread = threading.Thread(target=self.user_animation, args=[command])
249  self.led_ring_animation_thread.start()
250 
251  def start_led_ring_thread(self, command):
252  """
253  Start a thread to allow the user to control the led.
254  We use a thread to avoid the blocking effect of the Led ring
255  control methods.
256  """
257  # print 'get lock'
258  # with self.error_animation_lock:
259  # pass
260  # print 'retrieve lock'
261  self.stop_led_ring_thread()
262  # print 'stopped thread'
263  self.led_ring_animation_thread = threading.Thread(
264  target=self.dict_led_ring_methods[command.animation_mode.animation], args=[command])
265  self.running_status_command = command
266  self.led_ring_animation_thread.start()
267  # print 'thread started'
268 
269  def stop_led_ring_thread(self):
270  try:
271  if self.led_ring_anim.is_animation_running():
272  self.led_ring_anim.stop_animation()
273 
274  while self.led_ring_animation_thread.join(timeout=0.1) is None and not rospy.is_shutdown():
275  self.led_ring_anim.stop_animation()
276  if not self.led_ring_animation_thread.is_alive():
277  return
278 
279  except (AttributeError, RuntimeError):
280  pass
281 
282  def error_animation(self):
283  self.blink_over_status(RED, 5, 2)
284 
285  def blink_over_status(self, color, iterations, period):
286  self.blink(color, iterations, period)
287  command = self.get_robot_status_led_ring_cmd()
288  self.start_led_ring_thread(command)
289 
290  # - Publisher
291 
292  def _publish_led_ring_status(self):
293  """
294  Publish the current status of the Led ring, as a LedRingStatus message :
295  led_mode: either controlled by user or displaying robot status
296  animation_mode: which method is used to animate pixels (solid, flashing,...), as a LedRingAnimation message
297  animation_color: current animation color, except for rainbow methods
298 
299  Function called only when one parameter changed.
300  """
301  # check if led mode or led animations changed
302 
303  led_ring_state = LedRingStatus()
304  led_ring_state.led_mode = LedRingStatus.USER if self.user_mode else LedRingStatus.ROBOT_STATUS
305  led_ring_state.animation_mode = LedRingAnimation()
306  led_ring_state.animation_mode.animation = self.led_ring_anim.current_animation
307  led_ring_state.animation_color = self.led_ring_anim.current_animation_color
308 
309  if led_ring_state != self.led_ring_state:
310  self.led_ring_state = led_ring_state
311  try:
312  self.__led_ring_status_pub.publish(led_ring_state)
313  except rospy.ROSException:
314  return
315 
316  # - Usefull methods
317  def wait_until_finished(self):
318  """
319  Wait until all iterations of the Led Ring method are done. After that, the led ring is turned off.
320  If function was interrupted, return True.
321  """
322  if self.led_ring_animation_thread.is_alive():
323  self.led_ring_animation_thread.join()
324  return self.led_ring_anim.was_function_interrupted()
325 
326  @staticmethod
327  def _return_after_waiting(anim_name, iterations, interrupted):
328  """
329  Return a CommandStatus and a message, after the requested animation was completed
330  """
331  if not interrupted:
332  if iterations is not None:
333  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Led Ring set by user: {} iterations done - ".format(
334  iterations) + anim_name + " mode"
335  else:
336  # iteration is 0 for color wipe and solid mode.
337  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Led Ring set by user: done - " + anim_name + " mode"
338  else:
339  return CommandStatus.STOPPED, "Led Ring set by user: interrupted - " + anim_name + " mode"
340 
341  def set_user_mode(self, boolean):
342  if boolean != self.user_mode:
343  self.user_mode = boolean
344  self._publish_led_ring_status()
345 
346  def display_user_mode(self):
347  if RobotStatus.BOOTING == self.robot_status:
348  return
349 
350  command = self.get_robot_status_led_ring_cmd()
351  if command == self.running_status_command or self.__is_shutdown:
352  return
353  elif self.user_animation_lock.locked() and self.robot_status in [
354  RobotStatus.RUNNING_AUTONOMOUS, RobotStatus.LEARNING_MODE_AUTONOMOUS
355  ]:
356  return
357 
358  self.start_led_ring_thread(command)
359 
360  def get_robot_status_led_ring_cmd(self):
361  # Prioritize Emergency Stop animation
362  if self.robot_status in ROBOT_STATUS_TO_ANIM and self.robot_status in ROBOT_CRITICAL_STATUS:
363  animation, colors = ROBOT_STATUS_TO_ANIM[self.robot_status]
364  elif self.robot_out_of_bounds:
365  animation, colors = ROBOT_STATUS_TO_ANIM["out_of_bound"]
366  elif self.rpi_overheating:
367  animation, colors = ROBOT_STATUS_TO_ANIM["overheating"]
368  elif self.robot_status in ROBOT_STATUS_TO_ANIM:
369  animation, colors = ROBOT_STATUS_TO_ANIM[self.robot_status]
370  else:
371  # If no method defined (no entry for this key in dictionnay), turn off led rings
372  rospy.logdebug('Led ring - No Led control method defined for {} status and {} log'.format(
373  self.robot_status, self.robot_status_str))
374  animation, colors = ROBOT_STATUS_TO_ANIM[RobotStatus.UNKNOWN]
375 
376  command = LedUserRequest()
377  command.animation_mode.animation = animation
378  command.colors = colors if isinstance(colors, list) else [colors]
379  return command
380 
381  # - Animations functions
382  def user_animation(self, cmd):
383  animation_id = cmd.animation_mode.animation
384  with self.user_animation_lock:
385  self.running_status_command = None
386  self.dict_led_ring_methods[animation_id](cmd)
387 
388  # Pour certaines animation, on laisse la couleur,
389  # pour les autre on affiche l'etat du robot a la fin de l'animation
390  if not self.led_ring_anim.was_function_interrupted() and animation_id not in [
391  LedRingAnimation.NONE,
392  LedRingAnimation.COLOR_WIPE,
393  LedRingAnimation.SOLID,
394  LedRingAnimation.CUSTOM,
395  ]:
396  robot_status_command = self.get_robot_status_led_ring_cmd()
397  self.running_status_command = robot_status_command
398  self.dict_led_ring_methods[robot_status_command.animation_mode.animation](robot_status_command)
399 
400  def none_animation(self, _cmd):
401  try:
402  self.led_ring_anim.none()
403  except AttributeError:
404  pass
405 
406  def solid_animation(self, cmd):
407  self.led_ring_anim.solid(cmd.colors[0])
408 
409  def alternate_animation(self, cmd):
410  self.led_ring_anim.alternate(cmd.colors, cmd.period, cmd.iterations)
411 
412  def chase_animation(self, cmd):
413  self.led_ring_anim.chase(cmd.colors[0], cmd.period, cmd.iterations)
414 
415  def flashing_animation(self, cmd):
416  self.led_ring_anim.flashing(cmd.colors[0], cmd.period, cmd.iterations)
417 
418  def wipe_animation(self, cmd):
419  self.led_ring_anim.color_wipe(cmd.colors[0], cmd.period)
420 
421  def rainbow_animation(self, cmd):
422  self.led_ring_anim.rainbow(cmd.period, cmd.iterations)
423 
424  def rainbow_cycle_animation(self, cmd):
425  self.led_ring_anim.rainbow_cycle(cmd.period, cmd.iterations)
426 
427  def rainbow_chase_animation(self, cmd):
428  self.led_ring_anim.rainbow_chase(cmd.period, cmd.iterations)
429 
430  def go_up_animation(self, cmd):
431  self.led_ring_anim.go_up(cmd.colors[0], cmd.period, cmd.iterations)
432 
433  def go_up_and_down_animation(self, cmd):
434  self.led_ring_anim.go_up_and_down(cmd.colors[0], cmd.period, cmd.iterations)
435 
436  def breath_animation(self, cmd):
437  self.led_ring_anim.breath(cmd.colors[0], cmd.period, cmd.iterations)
438 
439  def snake_animation(self, cmd):
440  self.led_ring_anim.snake(cmd.colors[0], cmd.period, cmd.iterations)
441 
442  def custom_animation(self, cmd):
443  self.led_ring_anim.custom(cmd.colors)
444 
445  def blink(self, color, iterations, period):
446  with self.error_animation_lock:
447 
448  command = LedUserRequest()
449  command.animation_mode.animation = LedRingAnimation.FLASHING
450  command.colors = [color]
451  command.iterations = iterations
452  command.period = period
453  self.start_led_ring_thread(command)
454  try:
455  if self.led_ring_animation_thread.is_alive():
456  self.led_ring_animation_thread.join()
457  except RuntimeError:
458  pass
